item.title: 安装android sdk提示找不到JDK解决方法
item.description: 我的环境WIN7 64bit win7可以使用mklink做软链 Can also create symbolic link if you don't want to copy the files. (requires administrator privileges): mklink C:\Windows\SysWOW64\java.exe C:\Windows\System32\java.exe mklink C:\Windows\SysWOW64\javaw.exe C:\Windows\System32\javaw.exe 参考 http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4382178/android-sdk-installation-doesnt-find-jdk http://android-er.blogspot.com/2011/02/android-sdk-cannot-detect-jdk.html
